name: Geometric Date Battle
description:
This game was made for the Mix and Game Jam (2020)

Play as a seductive character and date geometric shapes in order to put them in your GeoDEX.  Controls: Mouse click Any resemblance with existing games is, obviously, fortuitous.

The  theme was Mixing Genres, and we decided to make a Pokemon-like turned-based combat mixed with a dating sim. Hope you'll like it!

We are 2 students in game design, we did  everything ourselves. 

There are a few issues with the music (it does not loop, and not continue smoothly between the scenes)
